files.name: main.py
files.content:
# Peterson, Holly 

from random import * 

secretNumber = randint(1,20)
print("I am thinking of a number between 1 and 20")

numberOfGuesses = randint(5,10)
print("You have",numberOfGuesses,"guesses.")

print("")

guess = ""

counter = 1

while (guess != secretNumber and counter <= numberOfGuesses):
    
    prompt = ("Guess #" + str(counter) +"? ")
    guess = int(input(prompt))
    
    if (guess < secretNumber): print(guess,"is too low")
    if (guess > secretNumber): print(guess,"is too high")
    
      
    counter = counter +1
    
if (secretNumber == guess): print("Yes!\nThe secret number was",secretNumber)

if (secretNumber != guess): print("Sorry, you ran out of guesses.")
